attributes.additional_details: the lessons doesn’t contribute on what we as students want to do with our future and what career paths we want to follow. And having a only Saturday as a day off isn’t enough because Friday we go to school and Sunday we do homework, chores, getting ready etc even if we have to go to school on Friday let it be about doing sports or cooking or programmes about different career paths. Reducing school days to 4 days will help with young peoples mental health and attendance giving better grades and engagement giving people more rest to recharge themselves and having the same subjects everyday can be very boring and doesn’t make school a fun place to go to especially since we spend a majority of are youth years there.
attributes.background: I would like to make the school days shorter for example ending school at earlier times like 1:00 or 2:00 or starting later like at 10:00

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Require schools to make Friday a part of the school weekend: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614046

Start school at 10am to help teenagers with tiredness: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612113
